Class MapScene.Layers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.sdk.mapview.MapScene.Layers
  • Enclosing class:
    MapScene

    public static final class MapScene.Layers
extends java.lang.Object

    A collection of map layer identifiers used in the MapScene.setLayerState(java.lang.String, com.here.sdk.mapview.MapScene.LayerState) method.
